entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.8Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
